patthana19.14:4.1: Naatīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana19.14:4.2: Naanāgato dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana19.14:4.3: Naatīto ca naanāgato ca dhammā paccuppannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana19.14:5.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe adhipatiyā satta, anantare tīṇi … pe … nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye satta, purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana19.14:6.1: Naatītārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.14:6.2: Naatītārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.14:6.3: Naatītārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana19.14:7.1: Naanāgatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.14:7.2: Naanāgatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
patthana19.14:8.1: Napaccuppannārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.14:8.2: Napaccuppannārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.14:8.3: Napaccuppannārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana19.14:9.1: Hetuyā sattarasa, ārammaṇe pannarasa, adhipatiyā nava … pe … purejāte āsevane nava … pe … avigate sattarasa.
